title: 108_s1233
content: National Great Black Americans Commemoration Act of 2004 - Directs the Attorney General, acting through the Office of Justice Programs of the Department of Justice, to make a grant to the Great Blacks in Wax Museum, Inc. in Baltimore, Maryland, to be used only for carrying out programs relating to civil rights and juvenile justice through the National Great Blacks in Wax Museum and Justice Learning Center. Authorizes appropriations in a specified amount to remain available through FY 2009.
